thread.title: One killed in Tenn. campus shooting; 2 injured
thread.title_full: One killed in Tenn. campus shooting; 2 injured

author: courier-journal.com
title: One killed in Tenn. campus shooting; 2 injured
text:
NASHVILLE — One person was killed and two others were hospitalized in a shooting late Thursday on Tennessee State University's campus, according to Metro police.
Police say the shooting stemmed from an apparent dispute over a dice game at an outdoor courtyard.
The shooting was reported around 11 p.m. and police are still investigating at the school, located at 3500 John A Merritt Blvd.
Two police cruisers are blocking off the entrance to TSU. Anyone who is not a student has been pushed off campus.
1 person fatally wounded & 2 others hospitalized in Thur nite shooting @ TSU--apparent dispute over dice game in outdoor courtyard.
— Metro Nashville PD (@MNPDNashville) October 23, 2015
